error.message: Call to deprecated method entityManager() of class Drupal. Deprecated in drupal:8.0.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal::entityTypeManager() instead in most cases. If the needed method is not on \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeManagerInterface, see the deprecated \Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityManager to find the correct interface or service.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_time_limit(). Deprecated in drupal:8.7.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Component\Utility\Environment::setTimeLimit() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.
Call to deprecated function drupal_set_message(). Deprecated in drupal:8.5.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use \Drupal\Core\Messenger\MessengerInterface::addMessage() instead.

Call to deprecated method isSubclassOf() of class Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeInterface. Deprecated in drupal:8.3.0 and is removed from drupal:9.0.0. Use Drupal\Core\Entity\EntityTypeInterface::entityClassImplements() instead.

Add core_version_requirement: ^8 || ^9 to adva.info.yml to designate that the module is compatible with Drupal 9. See https://www.drupal.org/node/3070687.
